LanguageData.RSID_ShowHP.Label: Show max HP for linkable structures and doors
LanguageData.RSID_ShowHP.Tooltip: Shows the maximum hitpoints for structures such as walls, fences, doors and sandbags
LanguageData.RSID_ShowHPForAll.Label: Show for all stuffable
LanguageData.RSID_ShowHPForAll.Tooltip: Shows maximum hitpoints for all stuffable buildings
LanguageData.RSID_ShowAffordance.Label: Show affordance given
LanguageData.RSID_ShowAffordance.Tooltip: Shows the maximum highest terrain affordance given by floors and bridges
LanguageData.RSID_ShowAffordanceRequirement.Label: Show affordance needed
LanguageData.RSID_ShowAffordanceRequirement.Tooltip: Shows the minimum terrain affordance needed by buildings
LanguageData.RSID_ShowCover.Label: Show cover given
LanguageData.RSID_ShowCover.Tooltip: Shows the cover given by structures such as fences and sandbags
LanguageData.RSID_ShowBeauty.Label: Show beauty given
LanguageData.RSID_ShowBeauty.Tooltip: Shows the beauty given by any building, both positive and negative values are shown
LanguageData.RSID_ShowMass.Label: Show mass
LanguageData.RSID_ShowMass.Tooltip: Shows the mass of any building that is minifiable
LanguageData.RSID_ShowSize.Label: Show size
LanguageData.RSID_ShowSize.Tooltip: Shows the size of the building when placed
LanguageData.RSID_ShowWealth.Label: Show wealth given
LanguageData.RSID_ShowWealth.Tooltip: Shows the colony wealth given by any building
LanguageData.RSID_ShowCleanliness.Label: Show cleanliness given
LanguageData.RSID_ShowCleanliness.Tooltip: Shows the cleanliness given if defined
LanguageData.RSID_ShowResearchSpeed.Label: Show research speed
LanguageData.RSID_ShowResearchSpeed.Tooltip: Shows the relative research speed of research-benches
LanguageData.RSID_ShowTechLevel.Label: Show tech level
LanguageData.RSID_ShowTechLevel.Tooltip: Shows the tech level of the building if any
LanguageData.RSID_ShowJoy.Label: Show joy gain factor
LanguageData.RSID_ShowJoy.Tooltip: Shows any defined joy-gain factor of a building
LanguageData.RSID_ShowJoyKind.Label: Show joy kind
LanguageData.RSID_ShowJoyKind.Tooltip: Shows the joy-kind for any joy-gain for buildings
LanguageData.RSID_ShowComfort.Label: Show comfort given
LanguageData.RSID_ShowComfort.Tooltip: Shows any comfort given by a building
LanguageData.RSID_ShowBedRest.Label: Show bedrest effectivness
LanguageData.RSID_ShowBedRest.Tooltip: Shows the bedrest effectivness for any bed
LanguageData.RSID_ShowStorageSpace.Label: Show max storage space
LanguageData.RSID_ShowStorageSpace.Tooltip: Shows the amount of possible stacks to store
LanguageData.RSID_ShowImmunityGainSpeed.Label: Show immunity gain speed
LanguageData.RSID_ShowImmunityGainSpeed.Tooltip: Shows the immunity gain speed for any bed that defaults as a hospital bed, if defined, or animal bed
LanguageData.RSID_ShowSurgerySuccessChance.Label: Show surgery success chance
LanguageData.RSID_ShowSurgerySuccessChance.Tooltip: Shows the surgery success chance for any bed that defaults as a hospital bed, if defined, or animal bed
LanguageData.RSID_ShowMedicalTendQuality.Label: Show medical tend quality
LanguageData.RSID_ShowMedicalTendQuality.Tooltip: Shows the medical tend quality for any bed that defaults as a hospital bed, if defined, or animal bed
LanguageData.RSID_ShowPowerConsumer.Label: Show power consumption
LanguageData.RSID_ShowPowerConsumer.Tooltip: Will show the maximum power-consumption of any building that consumes power
LanguageData.RSID_VariedPowerModLoaded.Label: Varied power-mod active, reopen this settings page after changing any power-settings.
LanguageData.RSID_VariedPowerModLoaded.Tooltip: There is a mod active that modifies power-draw of items when they are not in use (Turn It On and Off - RePowered or LightsOut). If you change the settings regarding power in any of these mods, reopen this settings page after to clear the cached powervalues in the descriptions. If not you will not see the updated values in game.
LanguageData.RSID_ShowPowerProducer.Label: Show power production
LanguageData.RSID_ShowPowerProducer.Tooltip: Will show the maximum power-production of any building that produces power
LanguageData.RSID_ShowDefName.Label: Show defName
LanguageData.RSID_ShowDefName.Tooltip: Will show the defname of all buildables
LanguageData.RSID_ShowDominantStyle.Label: Show dominant style
LanguageData.RSID_ShowDominantStyle.Tooltip: Will show any defined dominant style of buildables
LanguageData.RSID_ShowVFEGas.Label: Also Gas production/consumption
LanguageData.RSID_ShowVFEGas.Tooltip: Will show the production/consumption of gas of buildings in Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power. Depends on the power-settings above
LanguageData.RSID_ShowRimefeller.Label: Also Chemfuel use
LanguageData.RSID_ShowRimefeller.Tooltip: Will show the chemfuel use of powerplants in Rimefeller. Depends on the power-settings above
LanguageData.RSID_ShowWorkToBuild.Label: Show work amount
LanguageData.RSID_ShowWorkToBuild.Tooltip: Will show the amount of work required for completing the building
LanguageData.RSID_RelativeWork.Label: Show relative work-amount
LanguageData.RSID_RelativeWork.Tooltip: Will show the workamount as small/medium/large to get more of a general idea of the amount of work
LanguageData.RSID_RemoveRotateWidget.Label: Remove the rotate-info window
LanguageData.RSID_RemoveRotateWidget.Tooltip: Will remove the rotate-info window above the architect menu, if you think that you have it memorized by now.
LanguageData.RSID_CurrentVersion.Label: Installed mod-version: {0}
